src_original: sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāmy ahaṃ dṛḍham //  adyāgreṇa grahīṣyāmi saṃvaraṃ buddhayogajam //
vajraghaṇṭāṃ ca mudrāṃ ca pratigṛhṇāmi tattvataḥ //
caturdānaṃ pradāsyāmi ṣaṭkṛtvā tu dine dine //  mahāratnakule yoge samaye ca manorame //
saddharmaṃ pratigṛhṇāmi bāhyaṃ guhyaṃ triyānikam //  mahāpadmakule śuddhe mahābodhisamudbhave //
